homePage.subHeading: Harness the power of AI to explore the energetic properties of crystals and generate personalized jewelry designs. Blend ancient wisdom with modern technology for your unique vision.
homePage.discoverTagline: Discover your crystal allies & craft your vision.

creativeWorkshopPage.title: Creative Workshop
creativeWorkshopPage.description: Unleash your creativity. Configure every detail of your crystal jewelry and get AI-powered insights.

simpleDesignPage.title: Simple Design
simpleDesignPage.description: Quickly generate beautiful crystal jewelry designs with a few simple choices.

energyExplorationPage.title: Energy Exploration
energyExplorationPage.description: Discover your unique energy profile, analyze energy images, and find crystals that resonate with you.

questionnaire.title: Personalized Energy Profile
questionnaire.description: Complete the steps below to receive your personalized energy insights and crystal recommendations.

ei.q: After attending a social event, you usually feel:
ei.a: Energized, eager for more social interaction (E)

ei.q: When facing a problem, you tend to:
ei.a: Discuss with others to seek advice (E)

ei.q: At a party, you are more likely to be:
In your free time, you prefer:
When meeting new people, you usually:
When making decisions, you value more:
Between calling and texting, you prefer:

sn.q: When reading a novel, you focus more on:
Facing a new task, you tend to:
When recalling past events, you more easily remember:
Seeing a painting, you first notice:
When learning new knowledge, you prefer:
When planning a trip, you focus more on:
sn.b: The overall experience of the destination (N)

sn.q: When solving problems, you tend to:

tf.q: When a friend is feeling down, you will:
tf.a: Rationally analyze the problem and offer solutions (T)

tf.b: Feel hurt and need time to process (F)

tf.q: In a team, you value more:
When rules conflict with personal feelings, you will:
When evaluating a plan, you focus more on:
When expressing opinions, you tend to be:
tf.b: Tactful and considerate of others' feelings (F)

jp.q: For weekend plans, you are more likely to:

jp.a: Complete them early to avoid stress (J)
jp.b: Rush to finish before the deadline (P)

jp.q: When organizing your room, you tend to:
When making choices, you tend to:
When setting goals, you value more:

jp.b: A free and exploratory attitude to life (P)

root.title: Root Chakra (Security & Stability)
root.q1: I often worry about future security (e.g., income, housing).
root.q2: I easily feel anxious and uneasy in unfamiliar environments.
root.q3: I feel fearful and resistant to changes in life.
root.q4: I feel my foundation is solid and I can cope with life's challenges.

sacral.title: Sacral Chakra (Emotions & Creativity)
sacral.q1: I can freely express my emotions without suppressing them.
sacral.q2: I have long-term creative hobbies (e.g., painting, music).
sacral.q3: In intimate relationships, I easily feel a desire to control or be controlled.
sacral.q4: I am enthusiastic about new experiences and adventures.

solarPlexus.title: Solar Plexus Chakra (Self-Worth & Willpower)
solarPlexus.q1: I often sacrifice my own needs and feelings for others.
solarPlexus.q2: When facing challenges, I tend to withdraw or avoid them.
solarPlexus.q3: I have a clear understanding of my abilities and value.
solarPlexus.q4: I can firmly say 'no' and maintain my boundaries.

heart.title: Heart Chakra (Love & Relationships)
heart.q1: I find it hard to forgive those who have hurt me.
heart.q2: I feel a deep emotional connection and sense of belonging with others.
heart.q3: When I see others suffer, I tend to feel indifferent or numb.
heart.q4: I can unconditionally give and receive love.

throat.title: Throat Chakra (Communication & Expression)
throat.q1: I often suppress my true thoughts to avoid conflict.
throat.q2: In a team, I can clearly and confidently express my views.
throat.q3: I prefer to listen to others rather than express myself.
throat.q4: I often feel nervous or stutter when speaking.

thirdEye.title: Third Eye Chakra (Intuition & Insight)
thirdEye.q1: I often rely on intuition rather than logical analysis to make decisions.
thirdEye.q2: I have clear life goals and visions.
thirdEye.q3: I focus more on immediate reality than long-term possibilities.
thirdEye.q4: I trust my inner wisdom and judgment.

crown.title: Crown Chakra (Spirituality & Meaning)
crown.q1: I feel that life lacks clear meaning and purpose.
crown.q2: I often engage in meditation, prayer, or spiritual exploration.
crown.q3: I believe in a higher wisdom or connection in the universe.
crown.q4: I am full of curiosity and awe for the mysteries of life.

validation.answerRequired: Please select an answer for this question.

validation.emotionalStateRequired: Please describe your current emotional state.
validation.emotionalStateMax: Description should be less than 500 characters.

userProfile.title: Your Energy Profile
userProfile.description: Based on your answers, here's an analysis of your energy and suitable crystals.
userProfile.recommendationsDescription: These crystals are suggested to support your current energy and goals.
userProfile.crystalHealingDescription: These synergistic crystal combinations are designed to offer amplified support for your holistic well-being, integrating your unique energetic signature and aspirations.
userProfile.infoNotAvailable: Information for {{field}} could not be generated based on the provided details or was skipped.
userProfile.chakraAnalysisSkipped: Chakra analysis was skipped or could not be performed due to incomplete Chakra assessment responses.
userProfile.mbtiLikeTypeSkipped: Personality type analysis was skipped or could not be performed due to incomplete MBTI assessment responses.

imageAnalyzer.title: Energy Image Analyzer
imageAnalyzer.description: Upload an image to analyze its energetic properties.
imageAnalyzer.noResults: No analysis performed yet or no results to display.
imageAnalyzer.errorFileSize: File size exceeds 4MB limit. Please choose a smaller image.

crystalFilter.title: Crystal Discovery Tool
crystalFilter.description: Filter and find crystals based on your specific needs and preferences.
crystalFilter.noResults: No crystals match your current filter criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
crystalFilter.selectCrystalPrompt: Select a crystal from the list to view details.

creativeWorkshopForm.spacerBeadsPlaceholderEnhanced: e.g., Tiny silver beads, Small freshwater pearls, Faceted crystal rondelles. Use these to separate main stones, add subtle sparkle, or create rhythm in your design.
creativeWorkshopForm.stylingComponentsPlaceholderEnhanced: e.g., Ornate filigree caps, Engraved metal tubes, Decorative bead frames. These components add unique character and can become mini focal points.
creativeWorkshopForm.charmsPlaceholderEnhanced: e.g., Moon charm, Star pendant, Engraved initial tag, Tiny gemstone dangle. Charms add personal meaning and storytelling to your piece.
creativeWorkshopForm.errorMinStones: At least one main stone is required
creativeWorkshopForm.errorColorRequired: Color is required for the selected crystal

designPreview.initialPrompt: Use the form on the left to create a design, then get a drawing prompt to start generating images.

generatedSuggestions.description: Here are some creative ideas based on your selections.
